meta.name: Police 24/7
meta.description: Fearless men and women in law enforcement agencies across eight U.S. cities demonstrate what it takes to keep the streets safe from crime.

videos.title: The Chase
videos.overview: Suspects lead police on a car chase then a foot chase through houses. Officers apply first aid to a gunshot victim and arrest his roommate.

videos.title: Three Stops You're Out
videos.overview: A stolen truck leads police on a dangerous high-speed chase; a speeder gives the police an earful; a disgruntled mom picks up her drunk son.

videos.title: Close Shave
videos.overview: Officers go on a wild, stolen car chase involving a teenage driver; two men are suspected of stealing thousands of dollars' worth of razors.

videos.title: Patients and Patience
videos.overview: A call to a shooting leads to a scuffle and a lost gun, an officer must clear squatters from an abandoned house, an angry passenger does not appreciate getting a ride home.

videos.title: Into the Woods
videos.overview: A multi-officer manhunt through a swamp; A double homicide at a hotel leave officers looking for a suspect on the loose; A woman lost in Florida tries to find her way back to New York.

videos.title: On the Run
videos.overview: Officers in a nighttime manhunt search for 4 men involved in a shooting; An officer tries to help a woman and her three children looking for shelter; Two men are arrested after an accident downs two powerlines.

videos.title: Outrunning the law
videos.overview: A man in the woods is interrogated after his actions draw attention from a nearby school; Two men get lucky as they find out their warrants have just expired; A distraught man gets pulled over on suspicion of a DUI.

videos.title: You Again
videos.overview: Flagler utilizes their SWAT equipment to infiltrate a known drug house; A car pursuit leads to arrest of a man detained on the suspicion of ditching meth; Officers pull over a man for a DUI for the second night in a row.

videos.title: Tape It Off
videos.overview: Police find a woman covered in blood near a man that's been shot; A stolen car is recovered from a yard across town; Police respond to a domestic dispute involving an elderly man.

videos.title: Man's Best Friend
videos.overview: A K-9 unit helps lead a manhunt; A property dispute between a squatter and a motel next door; A suspicious vehicle is searched and a felony level of MDMA is discovered.

videos.title: Foiled Again
videos.overview: Police negotiate with a suspect barricaded in his bedroom; motel occupants fail to convince police that the found paraphernalia isn't theirs; a mishap involving a toy gun has potential deadly consequences.

videos.title: Credit Cards with Charges
videos.overview: Police attend to a melee at the gas station involving a golf club; a shoplifter is caught with several IDs and credit cards not belonging to her. A DUI suspect recognizes one of the arresting officers.

videos.title: Swift Justice
videos.overview: Police struggle to remove an overdosing motel occupant; a river rescue proves challenging to local police; a high-speed motorcycle chase leads to a sad confession by the rider.

videos.title: Locked and Loaded
videos.overview: Police respond to a tip of a suspect hiding out in a hotel; a suspect's auntie gives controversial advice to her nephew; a backyard dwelling gator gets relocated by a team of police.

videos.title: Bad Day at the Park
videos.overview: Wilmington police investigate a late-night picnic gone wrong; police are forced to figure out a custody dispute in the middle of a crowded bar; police rescue an over-heated dog left in the car.

videos.title: Run n' Gun
videos.overview: A man on a motorcycle leads police on a high-speed, multi-state chase; Police plot to stop a fleeing car; A traffic stop leads to suspects unsuccessfully trying to dispose of evidence.

videos.title: Family Matters
videos.overview: A traffic stop turns into a foot chase into the woods; a disgruntled boss works with police to get former employee arrested; A daughter is forced to call the cops on her mom after an altercation.

videos.title: Frisky Business
videos.overview: A traffic stop leads to a drug arrest with the suspect hiding drugs in an unusual place; a shattered windshield leads to a domestic violence arrest; Police are forced to subdue a man harassing and throwing laundry beads at people.

videos.title: Crime After Crime
videos.overview: A routine traffic stop uncovers a fugitive hiding in the backseat; Police must figure out a way to get a disturbed man from on top a box truck; Police must use discretion as a high-speed chase gets close to a school zone.

videos.title: Naked Aggression
videos.overview: Police are forced to deploy a taser while pursuing a suspect on foot; police help a man overdosing on the side of the road; police help reunite parents and their toddler at a corn maze; during patrol, police must act quickly once they hear shots fired.

videos.title: Jaws of Life
videos.overview: A vehicle pursuit quickly turns to a rescue once the driver crashes; police contain a man in the throes of a drug trip; a late-night driver gets caught with prescriptions that aren't hers.

videos.title: Side Swiped
videos.overview: Police race to save a women suspected of overdosing; police kick down some doors in order to arrest a suspect; a man pleads for help from the police as he tries to resolve family issues; a driver accidentally runs his car into a store.

videos.title: Small But Mighty
videos.overview: A melee at a bar is broken up by two cops who also happen to be best friends; police call fire and EMS to a scene of a severely injured man; police dogs find a man suspected of a hit and run.

videos.title: Too Much Whine
videos.overview: Police track down suspects using dogs and drones; police deal with a drunk man causing problems in the neighborhood; police investigate a fight unclear if the victims are being forthright; while on patrol, police find a woman involved in an accident who's had too much to drink.

videos.title: Food Fight
videos.overview: A routine traffic stop escalates into a foot chase with a taser deployment; a dispute over food leads to an arrest over outstanding warrants; a recently released man gets arrested for a felonious amount of marijuana; a driver is unaware he's driving a stolen truck.

videos.title: You're in a Pickle
videos.overview: Police find a man suspected in a domestic battery case hiding under a truck; police find a woman passed out drunk in her car; an officer finds himself in a dilemma concerning a man and a stolen gun.

videos.title: Keep Testing Me, Man
videos.overview: A crime prevention unit's car gets rammed by a fleeing stolen car; a suspicious group of people are found to have warrants and a squirrel; a homeless lady is warned to stop assaulting people; police pursue suspects relying on dogs and helicopters for help.

videos.title: It's Not a Good Day Today
videos.overview: A reported menacing call requires multiple police and dogs to resolve the situation; a man tries to get his car back from the impound yard; a security guard on a motorcycle tries to speed his way out of a bad day.

videos.title: She's in the Washing Machine
videos.overview: Police resort to extreme methods while trying to stop a fleeing suspect; an intoxicated man gets boxed in by police as he tries to drive away; police find suspects as they respond to a shots fired call.

videos.title: On the Edge
videos.overview: Police rush to help a woman in the middle of a domestic dispute; an upset man threatens to jump of the side of a building; a dirt-bike rider decides it's better to flee than to pullover; police help re-unite a dog with its rightful owner.

videos.title: Do You Want to Pick Up a Felony?
videos.overview: Police, with the help of canines, track down a suspect hiding in the woods; a traffic stop reveals hidden guns and drugs; police race to assist a woman who's been shot; a pregnant woman gets caught using a fake name.

videos.title: I Got One Running
videos.overview: A trespassing warning turns into a foot chase; a brawl breaks out between some bikers and locals; a 21-year-old with a crashed car tell police a dubious story; a reckless driver puts himself and others in danger.

videos.title: Keep Your Eyes Open
videos.overview: Rowdy teenagers cause problems at the local liquor store; a traffic stop yields both guns and drugs; a man creates a medical emergency by swallowing drugs right before his arrest.

videos.title: I'm Sorry, Grandma
videos.overview: A young man has instant regrets after getting stopped for stealing his grandma's car; a passer-by needs to be airlifted to a hospital after getting sideswiped by a car; neighbors accuse a man of indecent behavior leaving his sister in a difficult situation.

videos.title: Get Down!
videos.overview: A traffic accident uncovers a prostitute and drug dealer up to no good; police respond to a man accused of brandishing a gun; a good Samaritan helps police revive a man suspected of having an overdose.

videos.title: What in the World is This?
videos.overview: Police pursue people suspected of throwing rocks at passing cars; officers respond to a domestic violence call with a gun involved; an officer witnesses a car accident and assists with the rescue.

videos.title: Rocky Relationship
videos.overview: The police's search for a stolen car leads to a foot chase; gun shots at a football game create chaos; police deal with a situation involving a lady with illegal drugs and cancer; and elderly man suffers from a panic attack as he confronts the man that tried to steal his bike.

videos.title: I Don't Think It's Crazy
videos.overview: Police investigate a drive-by shooting at an apartment building; a homeless man is stopped for smoking fentanyl; a suspicious car leads to a drug arrest; police pursue a woman suspected of stealing a car.

videos.title: Where Y'all Headed?
videos.overview: A routine traffic stop turns into a foot pursuit; a man suspected of throwing knives is questioned by police; a hotel calls police to help with a non-cooperative man not wanting to leave the property.

videos.title: That's My Wife
videos.overview: Police pursue a man recklessly driving a motorcycle; officers coordinate with each other to pin in a suspected stolen car; police respond to a traffic accident involving an injured woman; police investigate a suspicious man going door to door asking for help getting his car unstuck.

videos.title: We're Not Doing That!
videos.overview: A combative driver provides officers with suspicious information and then attempts to flee; a neighbor tips off officers that a wanted suspect just got home; a domestic violence call leads to an investigation where police must figure out who to charge.

videos.title: Too Many Coincidences For Me
videos.overview: A traffic stop for improper use of center lane turns into a chase; a 911 call leads to officers helping a woman who stabbed herself; a speeding driver complains to officers of unusual health problems.

videos.title: Nice Try
videos.overview: Officers pullover a car containing a subject wanted for firearms and explosives; a traffic violation leads to an arrest of a man with contortionist skills; a wild hog making a mess gets the attention of the police.

videos.title: I'm Not Asking You
videos.overview: A speeding vehicle causes a head on collision with another cop car; a man with cancer is found with copious amounts of weed; police are forced to deploy a taser on a difficult suspect.

videos.title: Don't Do Nothing Dumb
videos.overview: Multiple officers are needed to arrest a fleeing suspect; suspected shoplifters second guess their decisions; a traffic stop leads to seizure of a hidden gun.
